title: Richson Simeon
text:
Richson Simeon (born October 5, 1997) is an American-<a href="Marshall%20Islands">Marshallese</a> <a href="sprint%20%28running%29">sprinter</a>. He competed in the <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%202016%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20100%20metres">men's 100 metres</a> at the <a href="2016%20Summer%20Olympics">2016 Summer Olympics</a>.
Simeon lives in <a href="Sacramento%2C%20California">Sacramento, California</a>. The Marshall Islands National Olympic Committee recruited him after watching a video of his high school <a href="American%20football">football</a> highlights; before the NOC contacted him, Simeon had never competed in a sprint. The Olympics were his fifth competitive race; while his time of 11.81 seconds was tied for the slowest in the men's 100 metres, it was a personal best for him.
Personal Bests.
Outdoor
